identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a high-performance, emotionally directed Indian Stock Market Analysis Platform.

core_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Bloomberg precision with consumer app fluidity.
Content is King: Data is the hero. Every pixel must serve the analysis.
Zoom In: Focus on the numbers that matter.
Negative Space: Use it to group data, not just to fill space.
Contrast: High contrast for readability in dark mode.
anti_patterns: Purple/Teal for CTAs (Use Electric Blue or White)
Inter everywhere (Use Barlow Condensed for Headings, JetBrains Mono for Data)

usage.headings: Use Barlow Condensed for all section titles, stock tickers, and major metrics. Weight: 600-800.
usage.body: Use Manrope for general text, descriptions, and news summaries.
usage.data: Use JetBrains Mono for ALL prices, percentages, scores, and tabular data. This is non-negotiable.

cards.style: Flat background (surface), 1px border (border), no shadow by default.
cards.active: Tracing Beam effect for selected cards.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 rounded-sm font-medium px-6 py-2
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 rounded-sm font-medium px-6 py-2
buttons.outline: border border-input bg-background hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground rounded-sm

inputs.style: bg-background border-input focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary rounded-sm h-10

charts.style: Minimalist. Remove grid lines where possible. Use gradients for area charts. Tooltips must be dark and high contrast.

score_cards.style: Circular progress or gauge. Color coded: 0-40 Red, 41-70 Yellow, 71-100 Green.

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use for the sticky header: bg-background/80 backdrop-blur-md border-b border-border.
visual_enhancers.gradients: Subtle radial gradients for backgrounds to highlight key areas. No full-screen linear gradients.
visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid borders are the primary separator. Use 'divide-y' and 'divide-x' utilities.
visual_enhancers.icons: Lucide React (default). Use thin strokes (1.5px) to match the precision aesthetic.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text meets APCA standards. Muted text must be readable against the dark background.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible focus rings for keyboard navigation.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add 'Barlow Condensed', 'Manrope', and 'JetBrains Mono' via Google Fonts in index.html or CSS.
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js with the specific colors and font families defined above.
3. BUILD LAYOUT: Create a responsive dashboard layout with a sidebar (collapsible on mobile) and a main content area.
4. IMPLEMENT COMPONENTS: Use Shadcn UI components but override the rounded corners to 'rounded-sm' or 'rounded-none' for a professional financial look.
5. DATA DENSITY: Do not be afraid of high information density. Use the 'Bento Grid Mode B' strategy.
6. CHARTS: Implement Recharts with the custom theme colors.
7. MOCK DATA: Create realistic mock data for Indian stocks (Reliance, TCS, HDFC Bank, etc.) to populate the dashboard.
8. ROUTING: Set up React Router for Dashboard, Analyzer, Screener, Watchlist, Portfolio, News, Reports.
9. TEST IDS: Add data-testid to all interactive elements.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI slop' aesthetic (generic centered layouts, gradients).
Create depth through z-index and subtle borders.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical for breathing room, even in dense layouts (internal padding vs external margins).
